discription: User Interface (UI) design focuses on the look and feel of the website, including layout, colors, typography, and visual elements..

User Experience (UX) design concentrates on creating intuitive and seamless interactions for users, ensuring ease of navigation and task completion.The content should be structured and presented in a way that enhances user engagement and understanding, aligning with the overall design goals and user needs.

course_details.title: Production Support
course_details.bannerContent: Are you looking for an exciting and challenging career? If the answer is yes, then a career in production support may be for you. At Wiley Edge, we give you all the tools you need in order to progress as a production support analyst.
discription: Embark on a Dynamic Career Path with Production Support Training

This course trains gradautes to become production support specialists working in financial settings. It includes an introduction of financial concepts as well as DevOps, SRE, and Disaster Recovery principles. Trainees in the course will learn how to use Linux in a production support environment, how to write programs using Python, and how to use SQL to retrieve and manage data in a database.
